REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0394 reute r f BC-MORGAN-KEEGAN-<MOR>-S 03-04 0068

TEXT.TITLE: MORGAN KEEGAN <MOR> SHARE OFFER UNDERWAY
TEXT.BODY: Morgan Keegan Inc said an offering of one common of its common shares is underway at 15.25 dlrs per share through underwriters led by First Boston Inc <FBC>, A.G. Edwards and Sons Inc <AGE> and its own Morgan Keegan and Co Inc subsidiary. Underwriters have been granted an option to buy up to 150,000 more shares to cover overallotments. Reuter
